Uses of Class
opennlp.ccg.alignment.Phrase

Packages that use Phrase
opennlp.ccg.alignment This package provides classes for modeling alignments between two phrases. 
 

Uses of Phrase in opennlp.ccg.alignment
 

Methods in opennlp.ccg.alignment that return Phrase
 Phrase Alignment.get(PhrasePosition pos)
          Gets the phrase in the specified position.
 Phrase Alignment.getA()
          Gets the phrase in A-position.
 Phrase Alignment.getB()
          Gets the phrase in B-position.
 Phrase PhraseReader.readPhrase()
          Reads the next phrase from the underlying reader.
 Phrase IdentifiedPhraseReader.readPhrase()
          Reads a phrase from the underlying input stream, first parsing the phrase's number based on the phrase tag and identifier attribute being used.

          Writes the start markup indicating a phrase's ID.
 void PhraseWriter.writePhrase(Phrase phrase)
          Writes a phrase by untokenizing its words according to the word separator being used.
